Reviews.Title: Good budget-friendly touchscreen phone
Reviews.Author: Jenny
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone to replace my Nokia E63 because I wanted a phone with a touchscreen and a full keyboard. Here are what I think are the pros and cons so far:PROS:Nice size touchscreen, very bright and vibrant.Disregard what the previous reviewer said about the blue stripe on the bottom of the phone because THERE IS NONE. The plastic cover on the screen has a blue stripe but the actual phone is COMPLETELY WHITE.Camera quality is great and shutter speed is super quick.Keyboard is easy to use and keys are big.Interface is simple and easy to understand.CONS:A little bulky.Camera could get scratched easily since there is nothing to cover it.Definitely will need a screen protector.One other thing that I found to be more of a nuisance than anything else is that the GPS positioning option was turned on by default so every couple of minutes it would activate itself and eat up a few cents of the money on my phone. Luckily it was easy to turn off so nothing to worry about anymore.Overall I really like this phone. I've only had it for a short time but so far I haven't had any problems with it. I would definitely recommend this for someone looking for a touchscreen phone with full keyboard that is also budget-friendly.

Reviews.Title: better than expected
Reviews.Author: nokia6230 "nokia6230"
Reviews.Content: I came from an N85 so I'm fairly familiar with Nokia phones in general and the Symbian OS in particular.I wanted a touchscreen phone that had a keyboard that was within my budget. I would have gone for the mini N97 but it's a bit pricey considering the C7, N8 et al are coming out soon.I've read almost all available reviews I can read online so if you did that then you know what you're getting into with this phone.The only thing that surprised me was the resistive touchscreen. I bought this phone expecting to return it immediately but the touchscreen compared to my capacitive 2G ipod touch is amazing. It's just as responsive and accurate. I was expecting to need a stylus or my nails to navigate the phone but you really don't!It is, however, a bit bulky but compared to the N85, it's pretty much the same.The NokiaMaps is redunkulous, tho.I LOVE it. The last time I checked it out was when I got my N85. The Nokia maps back then required a crazy-expensive yearly rate to use the turn-by-turn and was pretty much useless bec trying to enter an adddress REQUIRED a zipcode entry before it will search for it! This new interface works much like GoogleMaps (esp with an ovi account) and much easier to use. It has all the feature you can ever want on a stand alone GPS but you get a phone along with it!I specifically bought this phone to try out the NokiaMaps turn-by-turn while I rode my motorcycle. You can't beat an accurate GPS that you can plug your headphones/ bluetooth headset on and use while riding! And if you can find a suitable handlebar holder for the phone, you can mount it and still operate the phone with your gloves on bec of the resistive screen!The speakerphone is on the weakside bec it outputs to only one speaker so that's expected. The battery does not last more than 6 hours bec the data connection is ALWAYS active (bec of the widgets and GPS). It also doesn't charge off the USB but I can use my older Nokia chargers so that's ok.I'll update the downsides of the phone as I find em but so far, the last week of usage have been problem-free.

Reviews.Title: Costa Rica, Centroamérica
Reviews.Author: Hans0303
Reviews.Content: Bueno, por si algún compatriota leyera esto, le informo que el telefono funciona a la perfección con el ICE, excelente cobertura, y todas las aplicaciones estan disponibles. Todo lo demás información la pueden encontrar en los comentarios anteriores. Lo recomiendo al 100%!

Reviews.Title: not what I expected
Reviews.Author: tirah
Reviews.Content: I received the phone fast from 2-day shipping but I am disappointed with it. I returned it the same day! It doesn't look like in pictures, the color is off white and is not shiny but very dull looking. The slider is wobbly and loose so it doesn't feel good in the hand.  I've always thought Nokia products were well made but this phone just felt cheap.  I had the Nokia C3 before and even it feels higher quality.The Symbian OS is nothing to boast about but i knew that, however the touchscreen is quite annoying because you have to double tap to select something, if you tap once a "tip" pops up instead.  It's okay for the price, but there are better phones that cost the same or just a little more like the Samsung Wave 533 or the LG GW620.

Reviews.Title: Exelent phone with improvement opportunities
Reviews.Author: Fernando
Reviews.Content: It works realy good, is too fast, and both the qwerty and touch screem are really good. The web surfing and SMS are good as well.The battery cover over heats, can be because of my hand or the material, at full capacity (Facebook updates on, e-mail updates on, receiving and sending SMS (100 by day), web surfing, calls (30 minutes), the battery life dies in about 6 hours, so I have a charger at home, and another one at work. Without the web surfing it last 10 or 12 hours.The features (light level, personalized front menu) are reallu usefull and works real good. You need OPERA, since the browser it comes with the phone is too basic.No pen included for the touch screem, disapointed.

Reviews.Title: Nokia C6
Reviews.Author: Paulo P. Silva Prado "Paulo Prado"
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone, easy to use, the battery lasts long, good signal reception. I have been using it for more than 9 months now and had no deceptions so far. if you are not looking for something fancy like iPhone and needs a real work horse, this is the phone to you. I use it for professional use but it is worth to mention that the camera exceeded my expectations. You can also listen to MP3 songs but I highly recommend to buy a decent pair of ear buds. Once you do this, you will also be amazed with the quality of the sound of this phone.A hint for Skype users: you need to download Skype for Symbian from the OVI web site. For some reason Skype did not have it available on their web site. It took me a while to figure this out. There are some flaws with the Skype version for Symbian but at least it works and it is free.

Reviews.Title: Nokia C6 breaks and Nokia does not care.
Reviews.Author: Christopher M. Cassidy
Reviews.Content: Bought the phone and I love the thing for the functions it does BUT the back battery cover NEVER from day one would stay on. It popped off on a regular basis, pretty much every time it was placed in my wifes purse. The clip that retains the cover finally snapped off, when the phone was about a month old. I called Nokia and they told me to check ebay for parts!!!! I'm guessing if your phone breaks for any reason, they will tell you tough luck. Was my second Nokia I had bought and will be my LAST. Read this Nokia, I hope your lack of customer service results in sales losses, all for being to cheap to fix my phone when it was bad out of the box. Anyone else having this issue and wants to start a class action suit, count me in.

Reviews.Title: Nokia C-6 Review
Reviews.Author: debigg
Reviews.Content: The phone is a good piece of device with minimal malfunctions(freezing). Minimal freezing occurs when running more than 5 applications at once. It is easy to use and attractive in terms of its design, however it is a bit on the heavy side. The default applications on the phone are useful and the ovi store phenomenon made it even better. This is so as many more applications are available both free and those at a cost. the camera functions well; sound is good; the resolution is way better than average; the material used by the manufacturer feels sturdy and durable. However, the battery life could be better. overall its a good buy. Compared to other high end smart-phones with similar capabilities the price is very competitive.

Reviews.Title: Hmmn, good enough?
Reviews.Author: Henry C
Reviews.Content: I bought this cellphone to handle emails and internet access (besides calls and SMS obviously), and it's good to check your email and maybe to browse some webpages, but for most pages, stinks... Relationship price/performance is good, but it's not the best smartphone you're going to have. BTW, I really HATE the white screen it shows when it's loading something

Reviews.Title: It is a "new open box" item
Reviews.Author: DigiCarpenter
Reviews.Content: Recently I was looking for another cell phone for my husband and I got into a new term which is called" New Open Box", after searching on google I got to know what does that meant.  And it also makes me realized that the cell phone which I purchased from amazon at 2 months ago when I received it the box was opened and it missed one accessory - car charger, so I contacted their customer service and they refunded me $20 for the missing charger.  But just until now (8/18) after more than 2 months of my purchasing I found out the cell phone I got was so called" new open box item".  I already missed the return period so I am not going to pursue for refund or anything but just want to let whoever is interesting in buying this cell phone from amazon maybe you need to pay attention of that, don't make the same mistake as I had.

Reviews.Title: RETURNED..
Reviews.Author: cactusqt
Reviews.Content: This is a nice phone, however, after charging it, the screen had lines going through it; contacted Amazon to return it and they are sending a replacement.

Reviews.Title: Nokia C6 unlocked
Reviews.Author: Zahroh Muhaydean
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with product.  Runs a little bit slower than expected but overall, worth the price.  It's a smart phone that is easy on your wallet.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!!!!
Reviews.Author: Meme
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone almost a month ago.  I was a bit skeptical at first to try it, because of some other reviews I saw.  I decided to give this phone a try anyway, just to go with my own instinct.  I am very glad I did.  The Nokia C6 is a wonderful touchscreen phone.  This is my third nokia and I must say that I have never been let down by the brand.  I pretty much love everything about this phone.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: nokia c6
Reviews.Content: Last august (2011)I have bought this phone for my son. It arrived on august the 24th and my son was verry happy that finally he got his phone. But after two and half month, the touchscreen suddenly began to behave strange. And as of today (november the 9th 2011)the touchscreen stopped responding completely. A $219,00 phone that lasted only 2 month. I'm verry, verry dissapointed in this phone. Sorry Nokia, but I can not recommend this phone to anyone. This purchase was a waiste of my time and money. I do not even know whether I can or will return this phone to Amazon. That would cost me more money.

Reviews.Title: Nokia C6
Reviews.Author: Nazli YALCINKAYA
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for my cousin. She was using for 2 years and then suddenly it has some problem. Because of the connection of screen and keyboard. But it was fine phone for 2 years.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product!
Reviews.Author: Loana
Reviews.Content: Ive bought this back in 2010 and still have it :-)  my new baby has dropped it more than enough to say this phone is good quality, its big in comparison with others but I can say the futures this phone has makes it worth it to have it, ive been thinking about changing it but like i saidwith babies this phone is just exactly what i need. Very good purchase

Reviews.Title: NOKIA C6
Reviews.Author: Taiye Adesoji
Reviews.Content: It's just like the last one l used. It's strong and durable. zi successfully transfered all contact in the previous phone to it.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: irena Cabanach Dresden
Reviews.Content: Cool phone for the price, and for being Symbian. The operating system (Symbian) is slower than Android (off course, but you must know that). The unlocked is great, i used in Venezuela with Digitel and had no problems. I alredy have two years with this phone and the only thing I had to make was update the version of Symbian, and was cooler than the older.

Reviews.Title: Ecxellente teléfono cámara y teclado
Reviews.Author: Pablo Javier Panchi Huilca
Reviews.Content: Muy bueno a la hora de trabajar, enviar mails, SMS. La calidad de las llamadas es mejor que el iphone 4s.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: oyebowale oyenuga
Reviews.Content: Great phone... Exceeded all the description I saw online before I purchased it... Awesome deal. Thank you very much for thIs deal

Reviews.Title: Nokia C6 unlocked
Reviews.Author: Hyo
Reviews.Content: Got it as a present for my daughter, and she loves it. She's very hard on equipment, so we usually get Nokias (which can take a beating), and this feels very solid. It looks good, and now my wife wants one, too.

Reviews.Title: Buy Something Else!
Reviews.Author: Wamala
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone over a year ago after glowing reviews from customers. It has been nothing but a disappointment. The battery barely lasts two hours even with wifi off. The browser is iffy. The phone freezes up a lot, and syncing takes a while. I will be buying another phone. This is definitely not worth the $250+ that I paid for it.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT.
Reviews.Author: CARLOS "CARLOS"
Reviews.Content: EXCELLENT. PRODUCT IN GOOD CONDITION. BEST IMPOSSIBLE. VERY SATISFIED WITH THIS PURCHASE. THANK YOU FOR THIS SALE, you purchase GLADLY .. OK OK OK

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: njaviersito
Reviews.Content: Excellent cell phone! you can do it many task at the same time, good camera, good touchscren, good if you are multitask

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: davp13
Reviews.Content: It's the second C6 that I bought. It's a great cell and with the last firmware the software runs so good...

Reviews.Title: bad phone
Reviews.Author: feremez
Reviews.Content: I bought nokia c6 but now it doesnt work properly. Sometimes the screen freezes and i had to vait for open the secreen so i get angry and disappointment. And another problem is touch secreen doesnt work now . if you want to buy this one, think twice then decide to buy or not. in my opinion you should buy another one. :(

Reviews.Title: Nokia C-6 Smartphone
Reviews.Author: H. Sethna
Reviews.Content: I have had this Nokia phone for over a year and am very disappointed with the quality. My previous two cellphones were also Nokia of excellent quality, each phone was used for over 3-5 years. The current Nokia's battery life is less than one tenth of what is advertised even with Blue tooth and Wifi turned off. Wifi keeps turning itself on. Nokia sent me another battery while the phone was still under warranty, which was the wrong size!! In disgust I said nothing. Last month the Bluetooth radio stopped working!!!I am not going to send it back and pay and exorbitant repair bill. I am currently using my older Nokia because of the radio.The touchscreen works sometimes and not in other cases espcially trying to scroll down a list,My next phone will not be a Nokia.

Reviews.Title: Good phone for the right price
Reviews.Author: Eman
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for about two weeks. It does what Nokia says and does it well. Yes the OS is a little old and slightly laggy under certain conditions but it's no deal breaker if you understand that and aren't expecting the latest and greatest. Mostly I use it for pictures, video and GPS/maps. I don't text or do the social media stuff because I have no data plan. Oh yea, I use it for telephone service also. For what I do, it excels. I especially liked that I can download and use Google Maps with it as well as a few other interesting time wasters. That said it's no Android or I Phone so don't expect it. If you want maximum apps, you're probably better off paying more and going with a newer phone OS. The only real problem I experienced was a result of buying an alleged "used like new" model. It wasn't. The included charger was a non Nokia that was broken and the micro sdhc card that was supposed to be included was MIA so you might want to stick with a new one. But then again the phone works great and that's what this review is about. Thanks for reading.

Reviews.Title: The best phone for the best price
Reviews.Author: Makussz0r "Makussz0r"
Reviews.Content: I'm simply loving this phone. The only drawback I have, and the reason I did not give it a 5 star rating, is that yes, the OS is a bit laggy when opening screens and you get the white screen for a second or two and I had some apps close on me without any apparent reason or any error message (specially true with the Opera Mobile app).The Nokia C6 looks and feels like a poor man's N97, or more accurately N97 mini, except it's not actually that cheap. The C6 suffers from the worst excesses of the N97's software, without the saving grace of its solid hardware, resulting in a phone that's disappointing at any price.he C6 doesn't look too bad on paper. It's got Wi-Fi and 3.2Mbps HSDPA connectivity for fast Web surfing over wireless or 3G. But Web pages don't look great on the 81mm (3.2-inch) resistive touchscreen. It isn't as bright or sharp as the competition, and we found the Web browser slow and clunky to use. There's also no multi-touch zoom, and there's no other quick method of zooming into the text on a page either. Double tapping the screen does zoom in, but it doesn't reformat the text to fit the screen, which would have been a welcome touch.If the Nokia C6 was selling for a song, we could forgive its cheap-looking case and sluggish performance. But, for a contract price that's up there with that of the HTC Desire, one of the best phones of the year, we expect much more. The touchscreen version of the C6's Symbian OS already felt dated when it came out. Now that a year has passed, it feels painfully behind the curve.AWEOSOME UNLOKED PHONE

Reviews.Title: Problemas
Reviews.Author: Caancame "Carlos Andrés Campos"
Reviews.Content: El celular me agrada mucho, sin embargo el problema es que se reinicia solo, antes de ello presenta una línea en el centro de la pantalla, se oscurece y se apaga, de inmediato se reinicia.Antes había adquirido otro igual y está trabajando muy bien, pero con este tengo problemas.

Reviews.Title: I buy two Nokia c6-00 but I have been problems with one.
Reviews.Author: diego.arce
Reviews.Content: Since I bought the cellphones, one have been had some problems, show the screen in white for some seconds, or it turns Off when I make a call(some times), the hands free is not working fine.My comment is that only one of the two cellphones have been had problems, because the other one is working fine, but I don't know what can I do?, because I live in Costa Rica and don't know how contact the seller.[...]this is my second shop by internet, and I didn't have a good experience this time.

Reviews.Title: NOKIA N8
Reviews.Author: RMNEGOCIOS
Reviews.Content: The cell phone never turn on, is damaged. i have other before, this cell is amazing, but nokia have some problems whith the power on...

Reviews.Title: Phone came LOCKED
Reviews.Author: Israel T. Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Nokia C6 for use for when I travel and have come to find that it is still locked. Rated it 1 since I was duped into purchasing a locked phone. I tried to find email, chat or phone support from Amazon since I purchased directly. Can't find any, and my window for returns has expired. Can anyone tell me how to get Amazon to send me an unlocked phone or have them provide me with the unlock codes and/or procedures so that I may use the phone? I'm currently traveling and am now lugging around this paper weight. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: telefono lento
Reviews.Author: Erick Salazar
Reviews.Content: Hola despues de utilizar el telefono por un par de meses (2) siento que fue demasido, es demaciado lento,Pros*sistema operativo muy amigable*las aplicaciones free de la tienda ovi*el teclado Qwerty* buena resolucion de la camara.Contras:muy lento a la hora de girar,gira lento cuando esta con aplicaciones abiertas y dura mucho. se pega o en veces hasta cierra la aplicacion.* el touch no es nada bueno, es muy duro, aveces pensaba q iba a dañar la pantalla.*cuando lo actualiza te empieza a dar un pantallazo blanco, y luego da error de teléfono lleno cerrar aplicaciones* no es multitasking (lo mucho 2 aplicaciones y ya empieza a dar errores)*la aplicacion de em@il, se pega muy seguido, ahi q borrar la cuenta y volverlo a setear de nuevo c/15 dias.* hacer un hardReset cada mes. o mas seguido, ya que el telefono se pega. (y eso que todo lo instalaba en la memoria de la tarjeta de 32 gb)En fin, si me preguntan no lo recomendaría, creo q la nokia hizo un mal trabajo con este modelo, me arrepiento de haberlo comprado,espero que les sirva y no cometan el mismo error.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Rupo
Reviews.Content: It is a mobile meeting all my needs. I like it.I bought it after I lost my cellphone.Pros: Build in GPS  Wifi  Nice screen  Not too big to my hand  good quality  Good design for girlCons; Build in GPS is quite slow,and is not that exact in navigation  Wifi works well in personal apt but may not in public one such as the University I go to  Storage is quite small

Reviews.Title: Review for Nokia C6
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: The phone is a good first smartphone, but as you get used to it, you feel for more.Pros:1. Renowned brand2. Number of apps from OVI store.3. Good battery life.4. Good connectivity to internet via Wifi5. Front facing camera(secondary) for smooth video calls via fring.6. Decent Camera( 5 megapixel) with flash7. Good qwerty keypad.Cons :1. The touchscreen is not smooth.2. The memory supplied(2 GB) is less and gets over within days as you download apps and start using camera.3. Just one home screen.4. Lags with multiple operations.5. Symbian, not due to performance but due to deal bw MS and Nokia, so future uncertain.Overall good first smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Good Smatphone
Reviews.Author: Fabio
Reviews.Content: I bought it to be used in Brazil and still now is working very well.The main disadvantage point is the battery, that I have to charge every 2 days.Also the camera is not so good.

Reviews.Title: still can't activate it, does anyone know how to activate it
Reviews.Author: Ayka
Reviews.Content: I got it few months ago but still can't use it though I'm in the states. I have my US number, put it to Nokia but that number doesn't work with this phone. I showed that phone to some phone sellers and they said that I have to have a code to activate this phone. And i can get the activation code from seller only. I bought it from Amazon and they don't put seller contact for this phone. I don't know how to activate it. I need advice who already use it, please, can you advice how can I activate it?

Reviews.Title: good phone for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Streit
Reviews.Content: If you insist, like me, that a phone be unlocked, then your choices are limited, but you probably will find this phone to be quite satisfactory.  It is not an iphone, but then if you do not want to be owned by any one service provider, iphone is not a choice.  As a telephone it is very good, for internet I find it quite unusable, but then I have trouble using my laptop because it only has an 11 inch screen.  But people younger than me who have borrowed mine to try it out were quite pleased.I have not had any malfunctions with this phone, but I did with an earlier Nokia phone and I found that their customer service was excellent.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Phone, Easy Setup
Reviews.Author: salma pedret gabriel
Reviews.Content: This has been really fun,easy and simple to use, if there was any "Cons", I would say that it frezzes sometimes and has some battery problems, but nothing else so far

Reviews.Title: Nokia C6 Unlocked
Reviews.Author: mbolandi
Reviews.Content: I got the item just as described on the website. Great Service. No problems at all

Reviews.Title: NOKIA C6
Reviews.Author: tincho252
Reviews.Content: Exellent product!Easy to touch, talk or navigate!Choose NOKIA for no problems!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Smartphone!
Reviews.Author: triciatrini
Reviews.Content: This phone is the best, I bought it to use in Trinidad and it works perfectly the shipping was great. The features are easy to use the only problem is, it really needs a screen protector because it easily gets scratch and you should keep it in a case because how its white It may get a bit dirty. All in all its a good phone for someone whose looking at the price range and a great smartphone!

Reviews.Title: Looks Nice Operates Poorly
Reviews.Author: Clea Exley
Reviews.Content: I was excited for this phone because of it's similarities with the N97 mini. I liked the white coloring. However, it wasn't even all white. There was a random baby blue stripe by the control buttons on the front. And the plastic makes the white color look cheaper than it does in the photographs. Besides those little disappointments, the main problem I had with the phone was a huge issue: When I went to type a message using the QWERTY keypad it would always freeze up the phone. The only way to get the phone working again was to take the battery out and put it back in. This wasn't a solution. Every time I went in to type a new message freezing was unavoidable. The touch screen keypad still worked and didn't freeze the phone, but really? Why would I want to keep a phone where half of it doesn't work? If you don't mind wasting 1/2 of the money you spend on this phone, by all means, purchase the Nokia C6. Otherwise I recommend you find a different phone to purchase that actually works properly from the get go.I am returning this phone and will probably stay away from Nokia for a while, even though I have been pleased with their phones in the past.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: cesar
Reviews.Content: exelente compra y me la mandaron hasta ecuador... muy buena la tienda muy seria.. el perfume muy bueno .. personas serias

Reviews.Title: muy bueno
Reviews.Author: M. P "MIRJI"
Reviews.Content: el telefono es excelente, es facil de manejar, el único detalle es que algunas veces se pone lento y se queda guindado. Tiene buenisimas funciones puedes descargar las aplicaciones q quieras,lo recomiendo!

Reviews.Title: Too slow and lines on the screen
Reviews.Author: chococatz
Reviews.Content: Maybe the phone doesn't deserve one start, but I wanted to make it seem more dramatic. This phone is not was its shows on the picture, I had it for more than 6 months already and I can tell you:-Its PRETTYYYY SLOWW!-I get error messages ALL the time, when I'm calling,most on the times I have a really hard time going through with my call-Email works "ok" at the begging but then its a big issue to sync it.-When you have a really long call you get lines on the screen.- The touch screen starts to be a big issue after a while, its doesn't react.I Will recommend you to not get this celphone, I know that the operation system is really back, so maybe its not nokia, try a newer model like Nokia N8

Reviews.Title: Great choice!
Reviews.Author: Rain
Reviews.Content: I think this is a nice phone such as : great sounds, clear picture  but not at all.. SOmetimes they get stuck and notice errors : auto restart all or cant not hold the lock key, full memory even I dont have anything in the phone... Nevertheless, if you dont need a perfect one, The phone is fine and convenient to use for everone

Reviews.Title: Nokia C6-00 great cellphone
Reviews.Author: diego_pg
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent phone. This has everything: touch, full keyboard, multiple applications, good camera, GPS, WIFI, cheap price. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: i have a complain!
Reviews.Author: erika
Reviews.Content: i have a complain, in my orden u guys said i'll recive a 2 GB microSD memory card (contains Ovi Maps data for the US, Ovi Suite, music tracks and wallpapers) but it doesn't!! so, i don't know how to do to get it back! please any body help me... thanks

Reviews.Title: this is so foolish machine.
Reviews.Author: candy
Reviews.Content: this is so foolish machine. whenever the butter is full, I often can't star up the badly cellphone whenever the butter is full whiteout charging up. and the cellphone runs so slowly, I can't turn other function until waiting for over 10 seconds! please don't buy the so worse machine paying for so mach money!

ProductInfo.Features:
Unlocked quad-band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 frequencies and US/International 3G compatibility via 850/900/1900/2100 UMTS/HSDPA plus GPRS/EDGE capabilities
3G-enabled messaging phone with 3.2-inch touchscreen, slide-out QWERTY keyboard, and quick access to messaging, e-mail, and social networks
5-megapixel camera/camcorder; Bluetooth stereo music; microSD memory expansion to 16 GB; GPS with free Ovi Maps Navigation voice-guided directions
Up to 5 hours of 3G talk time, up to 384 hours (16 days) of standby time; released in July, 2010
What's in the Box: handset, rechargeable battery, compact travel charger, 2 GB microSD memory card stereo headset, connectivity cable
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia C6 Unlocked GSM Phone with Easy E-mail Setup, Side-Sliding Touchscreen, QWERTY, 5 MP Camera, and Free Ovi Maps Navigation (White)
